resources.string: tap to connect to NewNode VPN
NewNode is a peer to peer mesh network which works as a personal pseudo-VPN to get around blocking or establish good internet connection when connectivity is sparse.

NewNode works differently than a traditional VPN, which sends your connection to a specific sever. Traditional VPNs are unfortunately quite easy to block by IP address. NewNode, instead, sends your traffic through a mesh network which can even make connections directly between nearby devices. This, along with encrypting and disguising the traffic, makes NewNode very robust against any kind of blocking.
There is no location selector because the NewNode network is globally distributed.
